snippet: Republicans will show whether they care enough about the proper functioning of the federal courts to help defeat their party’s filibuster attempt.
abstract: Editorial calls on Senate to confirm Caitlin Halligan for seat on United States Court of Appeals for District of Columbia Circuit; contends Halligan should have been confirmed in 2011 and her confirmation is even more urgent now.
lead_paragraph: Republicans will show whether they care enough about the proper functioning of the federal courts to help defeat their party’s filibuster attempt.

headline.seo: Confirm Caitlin Halligan for the Federal Bench
headline.main: Confirm Caitlin Halligan for the Federal Bench
headline.print_headline: Confirm Caitlin Halligan for the Federal Bench
